00024 #ifndef _IMAGE_HPP_
00025 #define _IMAGE_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include <memory>
00029 #include <string>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace util {
00034 
00035 
00036 /// wrapper class for using 'gd' graphics library
00037 class Image
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     /// struct for holding rgb values (in [0,255])
00042     struct Color
00043     {
00044         int red;
00045         int green;
00046         int blue;
00047 
00048         Color(int r=0, int g=0, int b=0) : red(r), green(g), blue(b) {}
00049     };
00050 
00051     static Color white() {return Color(255, 255, 255);}
00052     static Color black() {return Color(0, 0, 0);}
00053 
00054     /// struct for holding pixel coordinates
00055     struct Point
00056     {
00057         int x;
00058         int y;
00059 
00060         Point(int _x=0, int _y=0) :  x(_x), y(_y) {}
00061     };
00062 
00063     enum Align {Left=0x01, CenterX=0x02, Right=0x04, Top=0x08, CenterY=0x10, Bottom=0x20};
00064     enum Size {Tiny, Small, MediumBold, Large, Giant};
00065 
00066     /// create an instance
00067     static std::auto_ptr<Image> create(int width, int height);
00068 
00069     /// draw pixel
00070     virtual void pixel(const Point& point, const Color& color) = 0;
00071 
00072     /// draw string 
00073     virtual void string(const std::string& text, const Point& point, const Color& color,
00074                         Size size=Large, int align=Left|Top) = 0;
00075 
00076     /// draw rectangle
00077     virtual void rectangle(const Point& point1, const Point& point2, const Color& color,
00078                            bool filled=true) = 0;
00079 
00080     /// draw circle
00081     virtual void circle(const Point& center, int radius, const Color& color, 
00082                         bool filled=true) = 0;
00083 
00084     /// draw line 
00085     virtual void line(const Point& point1, const Point& point2, const Color& color) = 0;
00086 
00087     /// set clipping rectangle 
00088     virtual void clip(const Point& point1, const Point& point2) = 0;
00089 
00090     /// write jpeg file 
00091     virtual bool writeJpg(const char* filename) const = 0;
00092 
00093     /// write png file
00094     virtual bool writePng(const char* filename) const = 0;
00095 
00096     virtual ~Image(){}
00097 };
00098 
00099 
00100 inline Image::Point operator+(const Image::Point& a, const Image::Point& b) 
00101 {
00102     return Image::Point(a.x+b.x, a.y+b.y);
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 inline Image::Point operator-(const Image::Point& a, const Image::Point& b) 
00107 {
00108     return Image::Point(a.x-b.x, a.y-b.y);
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 } // namespace util
00113 } // namespace pwiz
00114 
00115 
00116 #endif // _IMAGE_HPP_
